Text:
function ERI_EP05_14()
    --.転-6【2月第4週】「伊草ミナト、一世一代の大告白」
    SaveData.Title = "伊草ミナト、一世一代の大告白"

    --//BG：メインストリート（夏）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    MSG([[ The hectic days continued thereafter. ]])

    MSG([[ After all, my rival was none other than the national idol Hermes Himegami. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter how much I could wipe away the bad rumors that spread after my cross-dressing was exposed, the baseline strength was just too different. ]])

    MSG([[ If I neglected even a little of my daily appeal activities, the gap would quickly widen, and it was tough. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0888.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I'm home!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0790.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Welcome back, you must be tired from boys' class." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0791.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You should just skip boys' classes during the election period, you're so serious." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0889.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I ended up skipping almost a month. I’m doing my best to catch up." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0890.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Besides, now that my gender is out, I have to act as a 'princess' even in my true face." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0792.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ah... that’s true. Poor you." ]])

    --//SE：LINEっぽいの
PLAY_SE("SEb019.wav")
WAIT(500)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0793.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ugh..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0891.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Your phone’s ringing. Are you okay?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0794.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I’m ignoring it. It’s probably a message from Hiyu-san or someone." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0795.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Lately, for some reason, your knights keep consulting me a lot. They even want me to come to school; I’m fed up." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0892.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh, isn’t that a good thing?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0893.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "It means everyone’s relying on Akira." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0796.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "But that’s a burden... Even though I can’t repay their expectations at all." ]])

--;吉　テキスト修正「暮らしていたい」→「暮らしていきたい」(2020/02/02 23:51）
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0797.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I just want to live playing games without bearing any expectations." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0894.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Haha. That’s difficult, isn’t it? Living as a streamer must be tough too with editing and idea hunting, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0798.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well, that’s true though." ]])

    MSG([[ I really understood what Akira meant. It’s nice to be expected of by someone, but it’s also a burden. ]])

    MSG([[ Because when you try to meet expectations, you tend to overdo it. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0895.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "But it’s not a bad feeling, right? Akira originally studied hard to meet the expectations of the ladies." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0896.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I know Akira is actually a really hardworking person." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0799.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "...Thank you very much. Well, actually it’s not a bad feeling." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0800.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "If it’s for Minachin... I guess I wouldn’t mind trying a little harder." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0897.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I want you to do it more for yourself than for me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0801.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "B-because that’s..." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira stopped speaking there and groaned in frustration. ]])

    MSG([[ Then she went to the fridge and started placing the wrapped dishes that were on the table back onto it. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0802.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "A-anyway, let’s eat first. Since I’m on duty today, I tried making Minachin’s special omelet rice." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0898.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh, you made omelet rice? That’s amazing, Akira!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0803.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ah, no." ]])

    MSG([[ On the table were plates piled with burnt tamagoyaki. ]])

    MSG([[ I see. She struggled and couldn’t cook it well. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0804.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Please forgive me with omelet rice for today..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0899.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yeah, yeah, that happens at first. I failed a lot when I started too." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0805.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ugh... You might as well scold me! I wasted so many eggs." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0900.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "What are you talking about? That’s not wasted at all." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I patted Akira’s downcast head and headed to the fridge. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0901.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Aside from ketchup, I also prepared some spice salt, chili sauce, and grated daikon sauce for an egg party." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0902.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I can come up with strategies just as wonderful as Akira for cooking." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0806.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Minachin..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0807.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ah! I’ll help make the sauces, so please wait a bit." ]])

    MSG([[ Saying that, Akira picked up her smartphone that she hadn’t touched earlier and began quickly operating it. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0903.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "What’s wrong?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0808.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "N-no... I decided I should properly reply to the messages addressed to me after all." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0809.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I felt like dying from self-loathing when I made too many tamagoyaki, but Minachin wonderfully backed me up just now, right?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fd")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0810.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Even if I fail, someone will help me. Even if I can’t meet expectations, I won’t die. I thought I’d relax and deal with it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0904.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yeah, yeah. I think that’s better than being crushed by expectations." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0905.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I’ve suffered many times in Yuriai Private Academy life, and I’m sure Marika-neesan did too." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0906.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...It’s tough, isn’t it? To relax and be your true self." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It’s been a year since Akira suggested cross-dressing. ]])

    MSG([[ Dressing as a girl and becoming a 'princess.' Bearing many expectations as a 'princess,' betraying those expectations, and exposing my true self. ]])

    MSG([[ And then, being accepted by many people. ]])

    MSG([[ Because of that, I understand well how hard it is to find someone who truly understands. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0907.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (It really was a year full of so many things.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ And soon, it will come to an end. The time limit to save Marika-neesan is near. ]])

    MSG([[ This Princess Election will finally be the ultimate battle as Erika Ikusa. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0908.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (This life, too... will end.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ When I think that, there’s one thing I regret. To resolve that regret, I decided to ask Akira a favor. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0909.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Hey Akira. After we finish eating, I have one request." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0811.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "What is it? That’s unusual, hearing a request from Minachin." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0910.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yeah, actually..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0911.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I want you to sleep with me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0812.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Alright, alright, we can sleep together then." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0813.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "...Huh!?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
STOP_BGM(1000)

    --　　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//CG：アキラと添い寝（赤面）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask007" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM08.wav",2000,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0814.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "W-why now, all of a sudden, do we need to practice sleeping together..." ]])

    MSG([[ We lay side by side on one bed for a few seconds. Already reaching her limit, Akira whispered weakly in a trembling voice. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0912.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-it’s kind of embarrassing to do it again like this." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0815.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You brought it up! Take responsibility for this mood, okay!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0913.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yeah... but when we first did this training, you said 'there’s no need to be embarrassed between cousins,' remember?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0816.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "That’s true, but... ugh, my face is hot... I feel like I’m going to die." ]])

    MSG([[ Although I said that to Akira, my body felt warm too. ]])

    MSG([[ It was a subtle difference from the flush caused by previous nervousness. My chest was quietly pounding, a little sentimental. ]])

    MSG([[ A strange feeling, like wanting to get closer to Akira. ]])

    MSG([[ But it was definitely not an unpleasant feeling. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0914.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Sorry for saying something strange, Akira. This life will probably be over soon... I thought it was important to do this now." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0817.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I see... yeah, that’s true." ]])

    --//CG：アキラと添い寝（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0818.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Whether we win or lose the next Princess Election. Whether we can save Maricchi or not, it will end, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0819.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Our ‘Bokuhime PROJECT.’" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira reached out her hand toward me and gently intertwined our fingers. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0915.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yeah, that’s why... there’s something I absolutely wanted to tell you." ]])

    MSG([[ I squeezed her hand back and smiled at her. ]])

    --//CG：アキラと添い寝（赤面）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV048ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ Then sadness quickly disappeared from Akira’s face. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0820.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Heh...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0916.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "My true feelings that I’ve been hiding all along." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0821.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Y-yes..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0917.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Akira, I..." ]])

    MSG([[ I placed my hand on my chest about to burst. I looked straight into Akira’s eyes and calmed my ragged breath. ]])

    MSG([[ Then, to make sure my feelings were conveyed, I put them into words. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0918.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I want to attend Yuriai Private Academy together with you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0822.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "............Huh?" ]])

    MSG([[ Huh? Unexpectedly, Akira responded with a deflated word to my once-in-a-lifetime confession. ]])

    MSG([[ Maybe she didn’t hear well. It’s embarrassing, but I’ll say my feelings properly once more. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0919.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I want to attend Yuriai Private Academy with you. After we save Marika-neesan." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0823.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Attend together...? Huh?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0920.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-I mean, I told you you didn’t have to try so hard until now, but the truth is I wanted to go to school with you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0921.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-I’m sorry if it makes you uncomfortable. But I love you, Akira, and I want to be with my beloved Akira from now on, so..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0824.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "—That makes me happy!" ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    MSG([[ Akira suddenly raised her voice, cutting off my words. ]])
    --//CI：ベッドで悶えるゆるアキラ 109

    MSG([[ And then she began rolling vigorously on the bed! ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0825.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I’d love to attend together! But saying it in this atmosphere is wrong... wrong~~~~!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0826.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Mmmmooooooooohhhhhhhhhh!!!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0922.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Akira!? What’s wrong!? Stop that, the sheets are getting all messed up!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0827.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "The mess is my maiden heart!!!!!!!!!!!!" ]])

    MSG([[ While calming down wilder Akira, I was happy that she said, "It’s okay to go to school together." ]])

    MSG([[ After winning against Hermes and saving Marika-neesan, I could spend time with Akira. ]])

    MSG([[ Just thinking about that gave me more strength than ever before. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0923.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (Right now, Akira probably thinks of me as her close cousin.) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0924.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (But if we can always be together in the future, maybe—) ]])

    MSG([[ I still don’t have the courage to reveal these true feelings. For now, I’m just happy to extend the time I can spend with Akira. ]])

    MSG([[ And finally, the day of the Princess Election arrives— ]])

    --　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP05_15")
end
